Helper enumeration defining the electron quality types
Helper enumeration defining the muon quality types
no variation
+1 sigma: where sigma is the full error on the SF
-1 sigma: where sigma is the full error on the SF
+1 sigma: where sigma is the error on the SF only due to electron trigger contributions
-1 sigma: where sigma is the error on the SF only due to electron trigger contributions
+1 sigma: where sigma is the error on the SF only due to muon trigger contributions
-1 sigma: where sigma is the error on the SF only due to muon trigger contributions
statistical component of uncertainty from muons are used for total uncertainty
systematic component of uncertainty from muons are used for total uncertainty
